jobDescription: SkillStorm is seeking a Data Consultant (Tableau Analysis / Data Expert) for one of our clients in Chicago, IL or Charlotte, NC. Job Description:The Chief Operations Officer (COO) function within Global Information Security is responsible for business operations, finance and resource management, performance management and metrics.The COO team is also responsible for development and implementation of an integrated GIS workforce strategy that delivers on future-state resource, location and training goals.Essential Functions:Tableau Analyst Creating business requirements into dashboards.Work with business partners to identify business solutions.Ability to apply critical thinking to identify business requirements.Data Expert Familiar with agile development methodologyManagement in stakeholder communicationsTake business requests and translate into usable sets of dataThe data set has become very large, so we need some who can look at the business question and then present the data in a meaningful way to stakeholders
